channel.title: Need help (Emote repeat)

item.title: Need help (Emote repeat)
item.dc:creator: @ectophantom ectophantom
item.description:
@ectophantom wrote:

I need my emote command to repeat the emote, like keep it on. here is the current code, just tell me what i need to edit or give me a new command please!

else if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 1) { try { int emote = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6)); if (emote < 3217 && emote > 0) { startAnimation(emote); } else { sendMessage("Bad emote ID"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Bad emote ID"); } }

Read full topic
